forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clouds and some sun this morning with more clouds for this afternoon. High around 35F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low around 25F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 39F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.
